# Colorify ðŸŽ¨

A simple Python package to convert and manipulate colors easily.

## Installation
```bash
pip install colorify
from colorify import Color

c = Color("skyblue")
print(c.hex)        # "#87ceeb"
print(c.rgb)        # (135, 206, 235)
print(c.lighten(0.2).hex)
